籤詩版本二:
Aad bay u adag tahay in lagu dadaalo guusha, laakiin maalmaha dagaalka guurka ayaa si ku meel gaar ah mashquul u ah.
Aakhirka isagaa lagu dhufan doonaa, Nin gob ah ayaa dadka gobta ah haga.
詩意:
Hexagramkan waxa uu u taagan yahay duco qarsoon.
Wax walba waa wanaagsan yihiin.
解曰: Isbeddel ula kac ah. Enron dhamaadka. Haddii aad wax ka waydiiso isticmaalka. Kaliya dadka sharafta leh ayaa u dhow.
籤詩故事一:
Talada buuga Jiang Wei (talada buuga Jiang Wei)
Jiang Wei (202-264), magaca sharafta leh ee Boyue, wuxuu u dhashay Gobolka Ji, Degmada Tianshui, Liangzhou (hadda Gangu County, Tianshui City, Gobolka Gansu).
Muddadii Saddexda Boqortooyo, Kong Ming wuxuu ciidamadiisa ka soo qaaday Buurta Qishan lix jeer si uu u weeraro Cao Wei. Kong Ming aad ayuu u xanuunsanaa wuxuuna ku jiray xaalad halis ah. Wuxuu baray afar iyo labaatanka cutub ee kitaabka dagaalka guud ahaan Jiang Wei, isagoo rajeynaya inuu dhaxli karo dhaxalkiisa.
(Sababaha sheekadani waa in Jiang Wei la dhaxlay sabab qaar ka mid ah)
聖意: Nasiib wanaag qoyska, hanti, ganacsi, guur, Liujia, rag lugaynaya ma iman, Tiansi Zhongping, Liu xayawaanka guriga, Zhongping, raadinta dadka, dacwooyinka dadweynaha, socdaalka xaq ah, hantida lumay, cudurada bariga, Xingxingshan xabaasha wanaagsan
古人: Talooyinka buug ee Jiang Wei (Buugaag ilaa Jiang Wei)
